import {Steps, Step} from 'kpc/components/steps';
import Button from 'kpc/components/button';

<div>
    <Steps v-model="index" type="simple">
        <Step title="选择配置">请选择主机的配置信息</Step>
        <Step title="选择弹性IP">请选择主机弹性IP的配置信息</Step>
        <Step title="设置VPC" />
    </Steps>

    <Button type="primary" ev-click={{ self.previous }}
        disabled={{ self.get('index') === 0 }}
    >Previous Step</Button>
    <Button type="primary" ev-click={{ self.next }}
        disabled={{ self.get('index') === 2 }}
    >Next Step</Button>

    <Steps value="1" status="error" type="simple">
        <Step title="选择配置">请选择主机的配置信息</Step>
        <Step title="选择弹性IP">请选择主机弹性IP的配置信息</Step>
        <Step title="设置VPC" />
    </Steps>
</div>

.k-btn
    margin 20px 20px 20px 0

import Intact from 'intact';
import template from './index.vdt';
import './index.styl'; 

export default class extends Intact {
    @Intact.template()
    static template = template;

    defaults() {
        return {
            index: 0
        }
    }

    previous() {
        this.set('index', this.get('index') - 1);
    }

    next() {
        this.set('index', this.get('index') + 1);
    }
}

<template>
    <div>
        <Steps v-model="index" type="simple">
            <Step title="选择配置">请选择主机的配置信息</Step>
            <Step title="选择弹性IP">请选择主机弹性IP的配置信息</Step>
            <Step title="设置VPC" />
        </Steps>
    
        <Button type="primary" @click="previous"
            :disabled="index === 0"
        >Previous Step</Button>
        <Button type="primary" @click="next"
            :disabled="index === 2"
        >Next Step</Button>
    
        <Steps value="1" status="error" type="simple">
            <Step title="选择配置">请选择主机的配置信息</Step>
            <Step title="选择弹性IP">请选择主机弹性IP的配置信息</Step>
            <Step title="设置VPC" />
        </Steps>
    </div>
</template>
<script>
import {Steps, Step} from 'kpc/components/steps';
import Button from 'kpc/components/button';

export default {
    components: {
        Steps, Step, Button
    },
    data() {
        return {
            "index": 0
        }
    },
    methods: {
        previous() {
            this.index = this.index - 1;
        },
        next() {
            this.index = this.index + 1;
        },
    },
}
</script>

import React from 'react';
import {Steps, Step} from 'kpc/components/steps';
import Button from 'kpc/components/button';

export default class extends React.Component {
    constructor(props) {
        super(props);
        this.state = {
            "index": 0
        };
        this.previous = this.previous.bind(this);
        this.next = this.next.bind(this);
    }

    previous() {
        this.setState({index: this.state.index - 1});
    }
    
    next() {
        this.setState({index: this.state.index + 1});
    }
    
    render() {
        return (
            <div>
                <Steps value={this.state.index} on$change-value={(c, index) => this.setState({index})} type="simple">
                    <Step title="选择配置">请选择主机的配置信息</Step>
                    <Step title="选择弹性IP">请选择主机弹性IP的配置信息</Step>
                    <Step title="设置VPC" />
                </Steps>
            
                <Button type="primary" onClick={this.previous}
                    disabled={this.state.index === 0}
                >Previous Step</Button>
                <Button type="primary" onClick={this.next}
                    disabled={this.state.index === 2}
                >Next Step</Button>
            
                <Steps value="1" status="error" type="simple">
                    <Step title="选择配置">请选择主机的配置信息</Step>
                    <Step title="选择弹性IP">请选择主机弹性IP的配置信息</Step>
                    <Step title="设置VPC" />
                </Steps>
            </div>
        )
    }
}
